user_auth package

Submodules

user_auth.urls module

user_auth.urls.app_name = 'user_auth'

App name. Used for easy referencing in templates.

user_auth.urls.urlpatterns = [<URLPattern '' [name='login']>, <URLPattern 'login_user/' [name='login_user']>, <URLPattern 'login_success/' [name='login_success']>, <URLPattern 'logout/' [name='logout']>, <URLPattern 'logout_success/' [name='logout_success']>]

URLs for the user authorisation app. The first path displays the initial login page. The second path is the user authentication function. The third path displays a success page on login. The fourth path is the user logout process. The final path displays a logout confirmation page.

user_auth.views module

user_auth.views.authenticate_user(request)[source]

User authentication view with POST requests. User returned to login page if authentication fails.

Parameters:

  • request – HttpRequest object

  • username – Stores the username from the post information in the HTTP request.

  • password – Stores the password from the post information in the HTTP request.

  • user – Authenticates the user with the username and password. Returns None if authentication fails.

Returns:

Returns the login.html template with an error message if authentication fails. Otherwise, redirects to the login_success view.

user_auth.views.logged_out(request)[source]

Renders a custom logged out confirmation page.

Parameters:

request – HttpRequest object

Returns:

Returns the logged_out.html template.

user_auth.views.logout_user(request)[source]

Restricted view that logs out the user.

Parameters:

request – HttpRequest object

user_auth.views.show_success(request)[source]

Restricted view for authenticated users. Renders a success page on login.

Parameters:

request – HttpRequest object

Returns:

Returns the success.html template with the username of the authenticated user.

user_auth.views.user_login(request)[source]

Renders the login page for the user.

Parameters:

request – HttpRequest object

Returns:

Returns the login.html template.
